name: Virtual Event Chat Kit
description:
This complete design system kit can match any brand in just a few clicks, with 12 customizable themes, a comprehensive list of components with variants and states, and auto-layout functionality.


100+ polished screens coalesce into mapped-out flows and prototype, so you can jump into Figma and create your own custom event chat faster than ever.


We launched this kit on Dec 16th 2021, together with a React Sample App on Product Hunt.


To learn more head over here: https://getstream.io/chat/ui-kit/virtual-events
